heading: HR01937
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE LAGUNA LAKE DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (LLDA) TO IMMEDIATELY ISSUE CEASE AND DESIST ORDERS (CDOs) TO ESTABLISHMENTS WITH UNPAID PENALTIES AND TO FILE THE APPROPRIATE ACTIONS IN THE REGULAR COURTS OF LAW AGAINST THE SAME VIOLATORS
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2018-07-30

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01937
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE LAGUNA LAKE DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (LLDA) TO IMMEDIATELY ISSUE CEASE AND DESIST ORDERS (CDOs) TO ESTABLISHMENTS WITH UNPAID PENALTIES AND TO FILE THE APPROPRIATE ACTIONS IN THE REGULAR COURTS OF LAW AGAINST THE SAME VIOLATORS
